basics.name: Aron Jomuel Cabreros
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Electrical Engineering in the Department of Engineering at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring 2024.

projects.summary: Worked with advisors and other students in designing an interactive dashboard (via Tableau) displaying and filtering the power data for several UH buildings.
highlights: As a team, delivered a dashboard with visuals and comparisons of UH Manoa power data to Miles Topping (Director of Energy Management) to his preferences

projects.summary: Collaborated with other sub-teams to design the power system layout of the Rover.
highlights: Modfiy an existing Li-ion battery pack to accomodate new power requirements of new motors
Wire and replace faulty/dangerous connections between electrical components
Documentation of all electrical components used within the rover: model, specs, operating voltage/amps
